name: Ira
greetingText: I spent a lot of time on this because i am not really a web designer hahaha
wishText: Happy Birthday to a special person who is bringing so much joy to my heart. I am thankful for every moment we spend together, and I wish our happiness never ends.
text1: It's your birthday! Dah Tua Sudahhh And Sama Umur Dengan Saya Yipe
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yayyy! i hope etc...(On Whatsapp)
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it and i love you.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
